metadata.title: CVE-2021-28902 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In function read_yin_container() in libyang <= v1.0.225, it doesn't check whether the value of retval->ext[r] is NULL. In some cases, it can be NULL, which leads to the operation of retval->ext[r]->flags that results in a crash.

criterions.comment: libyang package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
